title: Chiropractor Oak Creek, Racine WI | Oak Creek Relief & Wellness
author: - Judy C
description: Oak Creek Chiropractor offers multidisciplinary care. Functional medicine, auto accident & peripheral neuropathy care. Call now to book an appointment!
cleaned_text: Welcome to Oak Creek Relief & Wellness Since 1995, the natural healthcare providers at [Oak Creek Relief & Wellness](https://www.oakcreekreliefandwellness.com/about-us/) have been passionate about helping individuals live vibrant, pain-free lives without drugs or surgery. Every age and walk of life is welcome, and we emphasize a gentle, customized, [multidisciplinary approach to care](https://www.oakcreekreliefandwellness.com/our-services/) accompanied by cutting-edge diagnostics. The Chiropractors at Oak Creek Relief & Wellness have been offering [patients](https://www.oakcreekreliefandwellness.com/new-patient-center/) effective pain relief and wellness optimization for over two decades.
